news.title: Elon Musk says he has formed a new U.S. political party, the 'America Party'
news.summary: Elon Musk says the new party would focus "on just 2 or 3 Senate seats and 8 to 10 House districts" Musk, the world's richest man, is the founder of the electric car company Tesla.

news.title: Trade deadlines and oil drama set the stage for a crunch week in global markets
news.summary: This is the weekly lookahead at the key global events that could move markets and shape policy. This week, we look at the events in the Middle East, Asia, Europe and Africa.

news.title: The CEO mindset is shifting. It’s no longer all about winning
news.summary: Today’s leaders must embrace failure, adapt fast, and lead through uncertainty, tech disruption, and political pressure. The CEO playbook is evolving.

news.title: Rep. Mark Green resigns from Congress, leaving Speaker Johnson with an even narrower Republican majority in the House
news.summary: Rep. Mark Green said he was returning to the private sector to start his own business. He did not share details about the business. Green was a member of the House Ways and Means Committee.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts are pounding the table on these 3 stocks
news.summary: TipRanks' analyst ranking service highlights three stocks, including Dell Technologies and Amazon, favored by Wall Street's top pros. TipRanks: Dell Technologies, Amazon, and Dell Technologies are among the best stocks to buy.

news.title: Can Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs recover financially now that he’s been found not guilty of the worst charges?
news.summary: The hip-hop mogul has already seen his net worth plummet from $900 million to $400 million, according to one estimate. His net worth has been estimated to be between $100 million and $200 million.

news.title: ‘I’m single’: At 70, I have $500,000 in stocks and $220,000 in savings. How do I invest my $130,000 windfall?
news.summary: “I’m receiving enough Social Security to live on,” she says. “I'm receiving enough social Security to living on.”

news.title: ‘She’s in a shaky marriage that could soon end’: Will my daughter’s husband get my IRA when I die?
news.summary: “I’m 84 and widowed. My daughter is the beneficiary of my IRA and the successor trustee for my revocable living trust,” he said.

news.title: The stock-market rally is broadening beyond Big Tech. Will consumer stocks bounce back in the second half of the year?
news.summary: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite are at all-time highs. From cyclicals to small caps, more stocks are joining the charge.

news.title: Stock-market investors went from panic to ‘Goldilocks.’ Are they getting ahead of themselves?
news.summary: Will “strength beget strength” as stock-market investors await a key tariff deadline? The U.S. is set to hit a key deadline on tariffs on July 6.
